Falls Bridge - Blue Hills Marine Environmental Research Institute click to view larger picture Blue Hill Bay side of Stevens Bridge- south side of entrance to Salt Pond. The water is fast moving as tide enters and exits. Flow of water changes direction depending on rising or falling tide. Substrate is large bounders to cobble covered with macro algae. Average Surface Water Temperature: 21.51 C Average Surface Water Salinity: 31.97 ppt

Science Center - Rye Seacoast Science Center click to view larger picture The Seacoast Science Center, located in historic Odiorne Point State Park in Rye, NH Site is just north of SSC building, rocky intertidal, large middle intertidal zone. Washburn Island - Vinyard Sound Waquoit Bay National Estuarine Research Reserve click to view larger picture Our study site is on the south shore of Washburn Island, mostly cobbles, fairly high energy beach, located within the Waquoit Bay National Estuarine Research Reserve, in Falmouth, MA on Vineyard Sound, on the south shore of Cape Cod. Here’s a photo that includes some of our students and leaders. Average Surface Water Temperature: 27 C Average Surface Water Salinity: 28 ppt
